ygData.subject: Re: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome Madagan. Remember that irritating bard in MM the other day that kept trying to educate you on the beauties of Lullaby on train stopping? Raises hand,
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome Madagan.

Remember that irritating bard in MM the other day that kept trying to
educate you on the beauties of Lullaby on train stopping?

Raises hand, yup...was me.



At 10:33 AM 11/5/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: John_Senior@...
>
>Hello everyone, I am a Bard and I play on Veeshan server.
>My character is called Madagan Sonweaver and he is currently level 27.
>Anyone else on this list play on Veeshan, I am currently killing Horrid
>Dark Elves in Mistmoore.
>
>
>
>
>
>eqbards-owner@onelist.com on 05/11/99 10:25:01
>
>Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
>To: John Senior/M&G
>cc:
>Subject: [eqbards] Welcome to eqbards@onelist.com
>
>
>
>
>Ho and well met fellow travellers and bards alike. I hope we can make this
>a
>meaningful moderation. feel free to announce your comments for the good of
>all.
>
>
>
>Thank you,
>Torenithus Legendmaker
>Bard of Qeynos
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>

with the subject lol.
